items.title: BCtCI Free Resources
items.content: A comprehensive list of all free resources available from Beyond Cracking the Coding Interview, including chapters, tools, templates, and guides.

items.title: BCtCI Chapter: Set & Map Implementations
items.content: Learn how sets & maps are built from scratch, and refine your knowledge of hashing.

items.title: Top-K Problems: Sorting vs Heaps vs Quickselect
items.content: The different approaches to finding the k smallest/largest elements in an array.

items.title: Queues in JS interviews
items.content: JS doesn't have built-in queues, which can be an issue if you have to implement a BFS. Here are the workarounds.

items.title: In Defense of Coding Interviews
items.content: A collection of arguments in favor of coding interviews.
